projects.title: B3 Internal Project
projects.summary: App and website built with React and React Native.
projects.description: The purpose of this project is to build a website with a connected app. The website is built with React and the app with React Native. The app is made for both iOS and Android.

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.summary: This website! :) This is built with Vue.
projects.description: This website is built with Vue and reads its data from local JSON files. I decided to use Vue to continue practice what I had been taught in school. The design and layout are all made by me.

projects.title: Tetris
projects.summary: Tetris game built with Java and Swing.
projects.description: Tetris game built with Java and Swing. The falling blockes are controlled by the arrow keys and the game can be paused by clicking the pause button. The players recieve higher points by clearing multiple rows at the same time.

projects.title: Asteroids
projects.summary: Simple 2D game built with Java and Swing.
projects.description: Simple 2D game built with Java and Swing. Control a spaceship and destroy asteroids. The game is over when the spaceship is hit or asteroids make it to the end of the screen undestroyed three times. This is the first game I have built and I am self-taught in Swing.

projects.title: Recipe Website
projects.description: This website displays recipes from a database and allows the user to search for specific recipes, filter recipes based on categories, and rate and comment on recipes.

projects.title: Weekly Menu
projects.summary: Website built with Java Spring that reads from, and writes to an SQL database.
projects.description: Website built with Java Spring that reads from, and writes to an SQL database. The user can create dishes and then generate a weekly menu where each day is assigned a ramdom dish, or the menu selects the dishes with the highest number of likes.

projects.title: School Management System
projects.summary: Java application that reads from, and writes to an SQL database.
projects.description: Java application that reads from, and writes to an SQL database. This was my first programming group project where the focus was on buidling a complex database. By using a terminal a user can create, read, update, delete and search for students, teachers, educations and courses. Each of these data entities has a many-to-many relationship to one another.
